text: Ara bani-isara'ilake ami para kare diyechi nadi. Tarapara tadera pascad'dhabana kareche phera'una o tara senabahini, duracara o barabarira uddese. Emanaki yakhana tara dubate arambha karala, takhana balala, ebara bisbasa kare nicchi ye, kona maâ€™buda ne'i tamke chara yamra upara imana eneche bani-isara'ilara. Bastutah ami'o tamra'i anugatadera antarbhukta.
